text: Hi, I’m using HubSpot email with the drag and drop editor, is it possible to stop ios gmail app from inverting my colors on dark mode ?

Even with a coded email, there’s little to no way to control converting on iOS Gmail. It does a full colour invert and doesn’t support the dark mode media query. Drag and drop doesn’t support anything for dark mode, so you have to work with what you’re using for light mode. Here’s a good resource: <https://www.litmus.com/blog/the-ultimate-guide-to-dark-mode-for-email-marketers/>
